Fulfillment of Non-Negotiable Criteria.description: Candidate has no professional Java development experience, frameworks (Spring Boot), or related tooling (Maven/Gradle) and lacks exposure to relational databases, making it a near-complete mismatch.

Fulfillment of Negotiable Criteria.description: While the resume shows strong AI/ML project work and LLM agent design, there is no evidence of microservices, cloud platforms, messaging queues, or containerization knowledge.

Continuity and Recency of Relevant Exper.description: The only professional experience is a 2024 freelance MERN role, which doesn’t align with the required Java stack, and there is minimal continuity in the target technologies over time.
